definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="return_string"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The Name is stored in the block as an NBT, when the GUI it opened this the text displaying the name uses this return, whatever is returned in the name</comment><value name="return"><block type="block_nbt_text_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">BASEblockName</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
